scripts.setup: rimraf -- hooks node_modules package-lock.json && ${NPM:npm} i && ts-patch install && npm run core:setup
scripts.clean: rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json webpack.config.js
scripts.apps-automated:clean: cd apps/automated && rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json webpack.config.js && ${NPM:npm} i && rimraf -- package-lock.json
scripts.apps-toolbox:clean: cd apps/toolbox && rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json webpack.config.js && ${NPM:npm} i && rimraf -- package-lock.json
scripts.apps-ui:clean: cd apps/ui && rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json webpack.config.js && ${NPM:npm} i && rimraf -- package-lock.json
scripts.core:build: tsc --build packages/core/tsconfig.lib.json --outDir dist/packages/core && copyfiles -u packages/core/*.md dist/packages/core
scripts.core:build.npm: npm run core:build && copyfiles -e "packages/core/__tests__/**/*" "packages/core/**/*.d.ts" dist && copyfiles -e "packages/core/__tests__/**/*" "packages/core/js-libs/**/*" dist && copyfiles -e "packages/core/__tests__/**/*" "packages/core/cli-hooks/**/*.js" dist && copyfiles -e "packages/core/__tests__/**/*" "packages/core/platforms/**/*" dist && copyfiles -e "packages/core/__tests__/**/*" "packages/core/fetch/**/*" dist && copyfiles -e "packages/core/__tests__/**/*" "packages/core/css/**/*" dist && copyfiles -e "packages/core/__tests__/**/*" "packages/core/css-value/**/*" dist && cd dist/packages/core && npm pack && mv *.tgz ..
scripts.core-compat:build: cd packages/core-compat && rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && ${NPM:npm} i  && tsc -p tsconfig.json && mv "$(npm pack | tail -n 1)" ../../dist/packages/tns-core-modules.tgz
scripts.types-ios:build: cd packages/types-ios && tsc -p tsconfig.lib.json && copyfiles package.json *.md ../dist/packages/types-ios
scripts.types-android:build: cd packages/types-android && tsc -p tsconfig.lib.json && copyfiles package.json *.md ../dist/packages/types-android
scripts.webpack:test: cd packages/webpack && npm run tsc && npm run jasmine
scripts.webpack:build: npm run setup && mkdir -p ../../dist/packages && mv "$(npm pack | tail -n 1)" ../../dist/packages/nativescript-webpack.tgz
